name: BlackNoiseforSleep
0:
”Alexa open black noise sleep”
”Alexa ask black noise sleep to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: black noise sleep
des:
Black Noise is a proven and effective way to block out distractions and fall asleep easy. Black Noise is the ultimate science-backed companion for relaxation, focus, and better sleep. 

All you need to do is say Alexa start Black Noise for Sleep, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
